mapper.sql: id, contract_name, contract_number, text_file, text_file_pdf, attached_files, currency_category, contract_amount, contract_tax_amount, contact_tax_rate, contract_roles, is_not_other, other_information, change_category, change_contract_id, rel_contract_id, contract_status, submit_status, contract_soure, file_export_category, file_export_count, is_deleted, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, create_dept, contract_big_category, contract_small_category, share, person_contract, person_code_contract, contract_period, starting_time, end_time, col_pay_type, col_pay_term, days, extension, counterpart_person, telephone_person, address_person, email_person, contract_form, seal_name, seal_type, seal_number, file_time, contract_template_id, contract_list_name, json, a_name, a_person, a_address, a_telephone, a_email, a_bank_number, a_bank_name, a_account_name

a.id, a.contract_name, a.contract_number, a.text_file, a.text_file_pdf, a.attached_files, a.currency_category, a.contract_amount, a.contract_tax_amount, a.contact_tax_rate, a.contract_roles, a.other_information, a.change_category, a.change_contract_id, a.rel_contract_id, a.contract_status, a.submit_status, a.contract_soure, a.file_export_category, a.file_export_count, a.is_deleted, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_user, a.update_time, a.create_dept, a.contract_big_category, a.contract_small_category, a.share, a.person_contract, a.person_code_contract, a.contract_period, a.starting_time, a.end_time, a.col_pay_type, a.col_pay_term, a.days, a.extension, a.counterpart_person, a.telephone_person, a.address_person, a.email_person, a.contract_form, a.seal_name, a.seal_type, a.seal_number, a.contract_template_id, a.file_time, a.json, a.a_name, a.a_person, a.a_address, a.a_telephone, a.a_email, a.a_bank_number, a.a_bank_name, a.a_account_name
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted=0 AND id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted=0 AND change_contract_id=#{id}
SELECT count(contract_status) AS signingCount FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND contract_status >= 60 AND contract_big_category = #{contractBigCategory}
select sum(contract_amount) AS contract_amount FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted=0 AND contract_big_category is not null

SELECT
FROM contract_form_info a LEFT JOIN contract_seal_using_info b ON a.id = b.ref_contract_id
WHERE
b.sign_time > concat(#{contractFormInfoRequestVO.startingTime})
AND b.sign_time < concat(#{contractFormInfoRequestVO.endTime})
AND a.contract_amount > concat(#{contractFormInfoRequestVO.minContractAmount})
AND a.contract_amount < concat(#{contractFormInfoRequestVO.maxContractAmount})

SELECT contract_big_category, sum(contract_amount) AS contract_amount, dict_value FROM `contract_form_info` info, blade_dict_biz biz where info.contract_big_category = biz.id GROUP BY contract_big_category

SELECT count(contract_big_category) as count, contract_big_category, dict_value FROM `contract_form_info` info, blade_dict_biz biz where info.contract_big_category = biz.id GROUP BY contract_big_category
SELECT sum(contract_amount) AS contract_amount FROM contract_form_info WHERE contract_big_category = #{contractBigCategory}

SELECT
FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted=0 AND contract_status='110'

SELECT
FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id IN (SELECT c.contract_id FROM contract_bond_setting c WHERE c.bond_id = #{id})

SELECT
FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND contract_template_id = #{id}

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(info.create_time,'%c') mouth, COUNT(DATE_FORMAT(info.create_time,'%c')) count FROM `contract_form_info` info WHERE info.is_deleted = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(info.create_time,'%Y')=#{yearStart} AND create_dept=#{createDept} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(info.create_time,'%c')

SELECT DISTINCT create_dept FROM contract_form_info WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND create_dept in ( SELECT create_dept FROM `contract_form_info` info WHERE info.is_deleted = 0)
AND create_dept <= #{contractFormInfo.createDept}

SELECT
FROM `contract_form_info` info WHERE info.is_deleted = 0 AND info.contract_big_category=#{contractFormInfo.contractBigCategory} AND info.contract_number != '' ORDER BY info.create_time Desc
